Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.bridge.runtime.spi

Interface BridgeSessionContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
PojoIndexingProcessorSessionContext, PojoMassIndexingSessionContext, PojoScopeSessionContext, PojoWorkSessionContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPojoSearchSession
public interface BridgeSessionContext
Session-scoped information and operations for use in bridges.

Used in particular when extending contexts: ValueBridgeFromIndexedValueContextExtension.extendOptional(ValueBridgeFromIndexedValueContext, BridgeSessionContext), ...
